numerical.title: Rate of Climb Calculation
numerical.text: Calculate the rate of climb for an aircraft with a thrust of {thrust} N, drag of {drag} N, and weight of {weight} N.
numerical.explanation: Rate of climb is calculated using the formula: rate_of_climb = (thrust - drag) / weight * velocity.

true_false.title: Climb and Descent
true_false.text: An aircraft's rate of climb decreases as altitude increases.
true_false.explanation: As altitude increases, the air density decreases, resulting in a lower rate of climb.

multiple_choice.title: Lift Calculation
multiple_choice.text: Which of the following factors does NOT affect the lift generated by an aircraft wing?
multiple_choice.explanation: Aircraft weight does not directly affect the lift generated by an aircraft wing.
